com.groupA.location.world

Interface MapManagerFragment.MapManagerListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MainActivity
    Enclosing class:
    MapManagerFragment

    public static interface MapManagerFragment.MapManagerListener
    The activity that deals with the manager -- that is, MainActivity -- must implement the following functions:
